title: Sold: N28 A&G John Clarkson Cut from Album

posts.post_title: Sold: N28 A&G John Clarkson Cut from Album
posts.post_content:
Cut from and album and a detached corner, but still great lithography!

SOLD, net to me, with $1 for PWE or $5 for bubble mailer, your choice.

Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with questions. Thanks!
